items.summary: Replace all existing content in the Donation section (section id="donations", currently implemented by `frontend/src/components/RewardsSection.tsx`) with the provided Donation copy for “Support Whispers Of The White Moon”, including the intro text, the Cash App donation block with handle “$WOTWM”, and the “Rewards” heading.

Render the reward tiers list in the Donation section using the existing `animeSiteConfig.rewards.tiers` data (`frontend/src/content/animeSiteConfig.ts`), showing each tier’s icon, name, donation range, and perks as bullet points, in the same order as in the config.
